transcript: We manually reconcile invoice approvals in NetSuite and email threads about 18 times a week. Each request takes around 30 minutes and usually involves 2 people. We track the status in Excel.
call_summary: Finance team reports heavy manual approval chasing and reconciliation.

extracted_fields.title: Invoice approval chasing across email
extracted_fields.description: Manual invoice approvals and reconciliation across email and NetSuite.
extracted_fields.failure_modes: Approvals stall and entries are duplicated
extracted_fields.success_definition: Single approval workflow with SLA visibility
